00013 #ifndef _UPK_SQL_H

00016 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00017 const char ctrl_create_audit_sql[] = 
00018                 "-- The schema table is used to lookup table names. All changes to this file\n"
00019                 "-- should be additive; never remove prior sql, only add to it, translate\n"
00020                 "-- prior versions to new versions and remove old versions in sql; not by\n"
00021                 "-- removing them from this file. Clean and lossless conversion from one\n"
00022                 "-- schema version to the next must occur as a result of running this sql.\n"
00023                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_audit._schema (\n"
00024                 "       version INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00025                 "       create_date INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00026                 "       table_name varchar(256) PRIMARY KEY,\n"
00027                 "       table_id varchar(256) NOT NULL\n"
00028                 ");\n"
00029                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_audit.service_s1 (\n"
00030                 "       uuid CHAR(36),\n"
00031                 "       svcid VARCHAR(2048) NOT NULL,\n"
00032                 "       package VARCHAR(2048),\n"
00033                 "       service_pid INTEGER,\n"
00034                 "       wait_pid INTEGER,\n"
00035                 "       command VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,\n"
00036                 "       command_n INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00037                 "       si_signo INTEGER,\n"
00038                 "       si_errno INTEGER,\n"
00039                 "       si_code INTEGER,\n"
00040                 "       si_pid INTEGER,\n"
00041                 "       si_uid INTEGER,\n"
00042                 "       si_status INTEGER,\n"
00043                 "       wait_status INTEGER,\n"
00044                 "       timestamp INTEGER\n"
00045                 ");\n"
00046                 "-- updating the schema table for this version's service audit table.\n"
00047                 "DELETE FROM upk_audit._schema WHERE table_name = \"service\";\n"
00048                 "INSERT INTO upk_audit._schema (version, create_date, table_name, table_id) VALUES (1, 1312914180, \"service\", \"service_s1\");\n"
00049 ;
00050 const char ctrl_create_cfg_sql[] = 
00051                 "-- The schema table is used to lookup table names. All changes to this file\n"
00052                 "-- should be additive; never remove prior sql, only add to it, translate\n"
00053                 "-- prior versions to new versions and remove old versions in sql; not by\n"
00054                 "-- removing them from this file. Clean and lossless conversion from one\n"
00055                 "-- schema version to the next must occur as a result of running this sql.\n"
00056                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_cfg._schema (\n"
00057                 "       version INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00058                 "       create_date INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00059                 "       table_name varchar(256) PRIMARY KEY,\n"
00060                 "       table_id varchar(256) NOT NULL\n"
00061                 ");\n"
00062                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_cfg.services_s1 (\n"
00063                 "       uuid CHAR(37) PRIMARY KEY,\n"
00064                 "       svcid VARCHAR(2048) NOT NULL,\n"
00065                 "       package VARCHAR(2048),\n"
00066                 "       is_active BOOLEAN,\n"
00067                 "       utc_created INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00068                 "       utc_modified INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00069                 "       utc_deleted INTEGER\n"
00070                 ");\n"
00071                 "DELETE FROM upk_cfg._schema WHERE table_name = \"services\";\n"
00072                 "INSERT INTO upk_cfg._schema (version, create_date, table_name, table_id) VALUES (1, 1312914180, \"services\", \"services_s1\");\n"
00073                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_cfg.svc_options_s1 (\n"
00074                 "       uuid CHAR(37) NOT NULL,\n"
00075                 "       key VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,\n"
00076                 "       value VARCHAR(4096),\n"
00077                 "       utc_added INTEGER,\n"
00078                 "       utc_modified INTEGER,\n"
00079                 "       PRIMARY KEY(uuid, key)\n"
00080                 ");\n"
00081                 "DELETE FROM upk_cfg._schema WHERE table_name = \"svc_options\";\n"
00082                 "INSERT INTO upk_cfg._schema (version, create_date, table_name, table_id) VALUES (1, 1312914180, \"svc_options\", \"svc_options_s1\");\n"
00083                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_cfg.svc_list_options_s1 (\n"
00084                 "       uuid CHAR(37) NOT NULL,\n"
00085                 "       section VARCHAR(256),\n"
00086                 "       key VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,\n"
00087                 "       id VARCHAR(256),\n"
00088                 "       value VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL,\n"
00089                 "       utc_added INTEGER,\n"
00090                 "       utc_modified INTEGER\n"
00091                 ");\n"
00092                 "DELETE FROM upk_cfg._schema WHERE table_name = \"svc_list_options\";\n"
00093                 "INSERT INTO upk_cfg._schema (version, create_date, table_name, table_id) VALUES (1, 1312914180, \"svc_list_options\", \"svc_list_options_s1\");\n"
00094                 "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upk_cfg.svc_option_hashes_s1 (\n"
00095                 "       uuid CHAR(37) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,\n"
00096                 "       options_crc32 INTEGER NOT NULL,\n"
00097                 "       list_options_crc32 INTEGER NOT NULL\n"
00098                 ");\n"
00099                 "DELETE FROM upk_cfg._schema WHERE table_name = \"svc_option_hashes\";\n"
00100                 "INSERT INTO upk_cfg._schema (version, create_date, table_name, table_id) VALUES (1, 1312914180, \"svc_option_hashes\", \"svc_option_hashes_s1\");\n"
00101                 "\n"
00102 ;
